dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: It includes 70,000 fashion-related gray-scale images with resolution of 28 × 28 pixels. The images belong to 10 classes, with 7,000 images per class. 60,000 images form the training set and the remaining 10,000 the test set.
dcterms:title: Fashion MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: It includes 60,000 RGB-color images with resolution of 32 × 32 pixels. The images belong to 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class. 50,000 images form the training set and the remaining 10,000 the test set.
dcterms:title: Cifar-10

dcterms:creator: P. N. Belhumeur
J. P. Hespanha
D. J. Kriegman
dcterms:description: It includes 165 gray-scale facial images of 15 different subjects (11 images per subject). The images have 320 × 243 pixels resolution and are taken under different lighting and facial expressions.
dcterms:title: Yale

dcterms:description: The dataset contains four classes including a Non-defective (ND) class and three defective classes. It includes 271 gray-scale images with a resolution of 244 × 244 pixels.
dcterms:title: X-ray
